DOC.criteria: Male female adult patient Children adolescent close epiphysial plate Defect size ≥2.5 ≤10 cm2 postdebridement Localized full thickness articular cartilage defect knee ( Grade 3 & 4 International Cartilage Repair Society ( ICRS ) classification ) Radiologically apparent degenerative joint disease target knee determine Kellgren Lawrence grade > 2 More 2 defect 2 correspond lesion Ankylosis Arthrofibrosis Diffuse chondromalacia Total/subtotal resect meniscus Insufficient Ligament guidance Patella malignement Inflammatory joint disease General cartilage degeneration increase joint deterioration Cancer , present within last 5 year Primary treatment child adolescent open epiphysial plate Chronical infection disease Untreated coagulation disorder Pregnancy lactate Known history allergy ingredients NOVOCART® 3D
